short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A featureful Cardano wallet. Beautifully built for security and simplicity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Interact with the Cardano Blockchain. Create and restore HW and Mnemonic wallets. Interact with dApps.

HW wallets support
- Ledger (all models)
- Keystone (coming soon)

Mnemonic Support
- 12-word
- 15-word
- 24-word
